definition: left to return to unchecked growth/overgrown/grown wild

sentences.english: A flower withered, not the whole barren spring.
sentences.chinese: 一花凋零，荒芜不了整个春天。

sentences.english: In terms of the Meatpacking District, it used to be very bare.
sentences.chinese: 就拿肉品市场区来说吧，那里从前很荒芜。

sentences.english: With a sinking heart, I realized that I was on a deserted island.
sentences.chinese: 带著一颗深沈的心，我明白自己是在个荒芜的岛上。

sentences.english: For mount Sion, because it is destroyed, foxes have walked upon it.
sentences.chinese: 因为熙雍山已经荒芜，狐狸成群出没其间。

sentences.english: The winds of the Great Plains caused huge dust storms on overgrazed lands.
sentences.chinese: 大平原上的大片草原由于过分放牧而逐渐荒芜。

sentences.english: Marie Deakin 's help, to make barren garden back to life.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽在狄肯的帮助下，使荒芜的花园重现生机。

sentences.english: Sometimes, when one person is missing, the whole world seems depopulated.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，思念会让整个世界变得荒芜。

sentences.english: Its development represents man’s triumph over remoteness and a harsh landscape.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚的发展，是人类战胜遥远和荒芜的成果。

sentences.english: He trudged the deserted road for hours.
sentences.chinese: 他沿著荒芜的道路吃力地走了几个小时。

sentences.english: Without it, the world is a much emptier seeming place.
sentences.chinese: 没有它们，世界只会看上去更加的荒芜。

sentences.english: No cataclysm has desolated the whole world.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何激变曾使整个世界变成荒芜。

sentences.english: Most people, looking at a newly-ploughed field, simply see a barren landscape.
sentences.chinese: 大多数人在面对新开荒的地域时，只看到一片荒芜。

sentences.english: Let us go, through certain half-deserted streets.
sentences.chinese: 我们走吧，穿过某条半是荒芜的街道。

sentences.english: And climate change means the badlands are growing.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化意味着荒芜之地的增加。

sentences.english: Because of requisitions, land was being abandoned and whole families were drowning themselves in village wells.
sentences.chinese: 横征暴敛使土地荒芜，整家整户的人被迫投井自杀。

sentences.english: Life is a barren travel, affair, and pain in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 人生是场荒芜的旅行，冷暖自知，苦乐在心。

definition: to abandon/to let go to waste
dark and uninhabited (idiom); remote and deserted/God-forsaken
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
